title: Did Megan Rapinoe ‘Stomp’ on an American Flag After the World Cup Final?
subtitle: Right-leaning commentators exploded into outrage after an incident in which the Stars and Stripes was briefly dropped to the ground amid joyous celebrations.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: U.S. soccer star Megan Rapinoe stomped on a U.S. flag as an unpatriotic gesture after the 2019 World Cup Final.
